meanings.definition: The act of falling in drops.
meanings.sent1: I heard the dripping of rain outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The dripping from the leaky faucet echoed in the empty house.
meanings.sent3: The rhythmic dripping of the water was like a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent4: The dripping of the paint created a mesmerizing pattern on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The dripping of the honey from the spoon was slow and steady.

meanings.definition: Fat or other liquid flowing from meat during cooking.
meanings.sent1: The sizzling bacon left a trail of delicious dripping in the pan.
meanings.sent2: The chef collected the meat dripping to use in the gravy.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the sizzling meat dripping made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The dripping from the roast chicken was rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent5: The dripping from the steak added extra flavor to the dish.

meanings.sent1: Her clothes were dripping wet after playing in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The umbrella was dripping with rainwater after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The dog came inside, dripping with mud from head to toe.
meanings.sent4: The ice cream cone was dripping with chocolate sauce.
meanings.sent5: The popsicle was dripping down his hand in the summer heat.
